about_the_game: This is the bone-chilling soundtrack to The Coma 2: Vicious Sisters, a Korean survival horror game featuring hand-illustrated graphics and a relentless psycho slasher. A collaborative effort between Hyunho Kim, Hakyung Kim, Sungwoo Hwang, SP3CK, and Navytone. They set the tone for the Shadow Realm and Mina Park's journey into darkness.
detailed_description: This is the bone-chilling soundtrack to The Coma 2: Vicious Sisters, a Korean survival horror game featuring hand-illustrated graphics and a relentless psycho slasher. A collaborative effort between Hyunho Kim, Hakyung Kim, Sungwoo Hwang, SP3CK, and Navytone. They set the tone for the Shadow Realm and Mina Park's journey into darkness.
